dct_title_s: Plan of the city of Adelaide in South Australia
dct_description_sm: Surveyed and Drawn by Colonel Light ; Ordered, by the House of Lords to be Printed ; Day & Haghe lithrs. to the Queen.
Shows vegetation, streets, parks, drainage, various locations (market, cemetary, government house, barracks, etc.), lot numbers.
"N.B. The 29 Town Acres selected at the Harbour are not given here."
Upper margin: "2nd report on colonization of South Australia," "3."
dct_creator_sm: Great Britain, Parliament., House of Lords.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
